ai_robot.description: Have any questions or need operational guidance? Feel free to click the AI assistant icon in the bottom right corner; it will do its best to help you.
ai_robot.title: AI Assistant

bulk_import.description: If you need to add multiple employee records at once, you can use this feature to quickly complete it by uploading a file.
bulk_import.title: Bulk Import Employees

dashboard.description: This is the system overview and quick access area. You can quickly understand key data and navigate to various functional modules.
dashboard.title: Dashboard Overview
